todo.title: make UI pretty

todo.title: need to be able to archive past todos
todo.description: We should also be able to delete one our tasks

todo.title: support multi project functionality
todo.description:
Goban only has one place to store current todos/doings/dids. 
 We want to be able to separate tasks based on the project that we are currently in. Should be able to navigate through projects with the UI adjusting accordingly

doing.title: functionality to move items

when we hover over a taks the footer should display a description of the task. 
 this task should have name, date, description

did.title: create edit tasks

We should also be able to select one of our tasks that are premade and edit the item.
 only have the ability to change the title and the description

did.title: create add tasks
did.description:
Now we have most of the navigation down.
 We need to be able to create a task and add it to this json

 Note we need to do some stuff with writing to json to persist!
